title: Heirloom Essentials Furniture Polish (Natural - Unscented), 8 Ounce
features: Perfect for those who are sensitive to scents
Will not leave a waxy buildup on your furniture
description: Heirloom Essentials Fine Furniture Polish offers a refreshing, pleasant way to clean and protect your solid wood furniture! After using this product, not only will your furniture be protected, but your home will smell fresh and aromatic for hours afterward! This product is designed to work well with your high quality solid wood furniture. It contains no silicone or wax and will not leave behind a film or residue! The formula is Non-Aerosol, and was produced without animal testing. Try pairing the Fine Furniture Polish with the Heirloom Essentials Spotless Wood Furniture and Glass Cleaner for an easy 2-Step clean and shine process that is sure to impress!
